mapper.select: SELECT order_date as date, DATE_FORMAT(order_date, '%m-%d') as label, ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(total_amount), 0), 2) as salesAmount, COUNT(*) as orderCount FROM ( SELECT DATE(create_time) as order_date, total_amount FROM sale_order WHERE status = 1 AND create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) t GROUP BY order_date ORDER BY order_date

SELECT order_month as month, CONCAT(order_month, '月') as label, ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(total_amount), 0), 2) as salesAmount, COUNT(*) as orderCount FROM ( SELECT MONTH(create_time) as order_month, total_amount FROM sale_order WHERE status = 1 AND YEAR(create_time) = #{year} AND MONTH(create_time) <= #{currentMonth} ) t GROUP BY order_month ORDER BY order_month
